game.name: DCS: MB-339
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The MB-339 was exported in several foreign countries in which some specimens are still operative. This aircraft also took part in the Falklands-Malvinas war with the Armada de la República Argentina (Argentina Navy) and was also used by the Eritrean Air Force in various roles, against rebels, smuggl
